strapiPost.title: First Friday To Kick Off Art & Culinary Week
strapiPost.content:
Bentonvilleâ€™s monthly block party celebration is this Friday, September 2, and the theme is Art, Music, & Culinary to kick off Art & Culinary Week!

  • FF: The September First Friday will begin at 11a with food trucks and music, and the activities and activations will commence at 3p. You can expect some of the most talented jazz musicians in the region and over 80 local artists, artisans, and craftspeople showcasing their talents on the Bentonville Square. There will be plenty of opportunities to engage in art making, too!
  • Full week: First Friday will kick off Art & Culinary Week in Downtown Bentonville, which will include multiple in-person and virtual events over eight days. From a culinary tour to an appetizer class and live painting, the week will be full of great fun! 

Learn more HERE.
